Uses of Package
io.permazen.kv.util

Packages that use io.permazen.kv.util
Package
Description
io.permazen.kv.array
A simple KVStore implementation based on a sorted array of key/value pairs.
io.permazen.kv.caching
Caching KVStore and KVDatabase layers.
io.permazen.kv.leveldb
KVDatabase implementation based on LevelDB.
io.permazen.kv.lmdb
KVDatabase implementation based on LMDB.
io.permazen.kv.mvcc
Utility classes for MVCC type operations using a KVStore.
io.permazen.kv.mvstore
AtomicKVStore and KVDatabase implementations based on H2 MVStore.
io.permazen.kv.raft.fallback
A partition-tolerant KVDatabase that automatically migrates between a clustered RaftKVDatabase and a private non-clustered "standalone mode" KVDatabase, based on availability of the Raft cluster.
io.permazen.kv.spanner
KVDatabase implementation based on Google Cloud Spanner.
io.permazen.kv.sql
KVDatabase implementations based on SQL connections.
io.permazen.kv.util
Utility classes relating to the KVDatabase interface.
io.permazen.kv.xodus
KVDatabase implementation based on Xodus.

    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.

  • Classes in io.permazen.kv.util used by io.permazen.kv.util
    Class
    Description
    AbstractKVNavigableMap
    NavigableMap support superclass for maps backed by keys and values encoded as byte[] arrays in a KVStore.
    AbstractKVNavigableSet
    NavigableSet support superclass for sets backed by elements encoded as byte[] array keys in a KVStore.
    ForwardingKVStore
    Forwards all KVStore operations to another underlying KVStore.
    KeyWatchTracker
    Utility class used to track key watches.
    MemoryKVStore
    Provides a KVStore view of an underlying ConcurrentNavigableMap<ByteData, ByteData>.
    PrefixKVDatabase
    Prefix KVDatabase implementation.
    PrefixKVStore
    A KVStore view of all keys having a common byte[] prefix in an outer, containing KVStore.
    PrefixKVTransaction
    KVTransaction view of all keys having a common byte[] prefix in a containing KVTransaction.
